mapper.select: SELECT BOARDID, BOARDEMAIL, BOARDCONTENT, LEFT(WRITEDATETIME, 10) WRITEDATETIME, LEFT(EDITDATETIME, 10) EDITDATETIME FROM BOARD ORDER BY IF(ISNULL(EDITDATETIME), WRITEDATETIME, EDITDATETIME) DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARDEMAIL, BOARDPASSWORD, BOARDCONTENT, WRITEDATETIME) VALUES( #{boardEmail}, #{boardPassword}, #{boardContent}, NOW() )
